description:
Plow into rough rapids with confidence in this self-bailing packraft. Packing down to the size of a small sleeping bag and rated for up to class III rapids, the Nirvana makes it easy to get on the water. The self-bailing design allows incoming water to drain right back out, eliminating the risk of swamping. And, the open top keeps weight low and is quick to get in and out of, a nice feature when scouting rapids or during a self-rescue. Ruggedly constructed with the pontoons and spraydeck using the same burly material found on full-sized commercial rafts, while the floor system gets a serious upgrade of a Kevlar® Aramid blend. Gone are the days of needing a roof rack to get out for a paddle, just pop your packraft in your pack, pannier or trunk and you’re good to go.

  • Tough TPU-coated 210D nylon sidewalls, 840D Kevlar Aramid-Nylon blend reinforced floor system
  • Open self-bailing design drains water as soon as it enters the boat
  • Inflatable floor win integrated seat floats above any incoming water
  • 8-stainless steel lash points (4 bow, 2 stern, and 2 internal) for securing gear or mounting a back-band
  • Leafield D7 valve makes for quick inflation and deflation
  • Water rating: class I – III
  • Weight capacity: up to 136kg (300lbs)
  • Inner dimensions: 145 x 41cm (57 x 16cm)
  • Included: 1x Nirvana, 1x inflation bag, 1x inflation tube, 1x compression strap set, 1x EVA backband, 1x inflatable floor with integrated seat, and 1x repair kit with glue and zipper lubricant
name: Kokopelli Nirvana Self-Bailing Packraft
